Create Graph : convert date into dmy



```{r graph}


df_TT$Date <- dmy(df_TT$Date)


df_TT %>% 
ggplot(aes(x=Date, y= MeanAirT)) +
    geom_line()

# calculate thermal time sum

df_TT$TT <- 0

df_TT$MeanAirT[1]

for(i in 1:length(df_TT$Date)) { 
  if(i==1) {df_TT$TT[i] <- df_TT$MeanAirT[i] } 
  else {
     df_TT$TT[i] <- df_TT$TT[i-1] + df_TT$MeanAirT[i] 
  }
}

head(df_TT)
write.csv(df_TT,"ThermalSum.csv")
write.table(df_TT,"ThermalSum.txt")

```
